layman_description: Base damage dealt to living targets like zombies, animals, and players.
technical_description: Integer value applied before armor/resistance calculations.

layman_description: Number of inventory slots in a container or backpack.
technical_description: Defines grid size for item storage UI.
player_impact: Larger bags let you carry more items before returning to base.

layman_description: Copies all properties from another item/block, then applies overrides.
technical_description: XML inheritance - child inherits parent properties.
player_impact: Mods use this to tweak existing items without redefining everything.

layman_description: What the block/item is made of - affects durability, damage resistance, and tool effectiveness.
technical_description: Links to Materials.xml for physics and destruction behavior.
player_impact: Stone is harder to break than wood, metal resists more damage.

layman_description: Labels that categorize items for perks, recipes, and game systems.
technical_description: Comma-separated strings matched by perk requirements and loot groups.
player_impact: Perks like 'Miner 69er' boost items with the 'pickaxe' tag.

layman_description: Controls if this item appears in Creative Menu.
player_impact: Hidden items won't clutter the creative menu but can still exist in-game.

layman_description: Which inventory icon image to display for this item.
player_impact: Visual only - helps identify items quickly in inventory.

layman_description: Placeable world objects - terrain, structures, decorations, workstations, and everything you can build with.
technical_description: Defined in blocks.xml, includes collision, materials, and multiblock support.
player_impact: Blocks are the building blocks of bases, POIs, and the entire world.

layman_description: Anything that goes in your inventory - weapons, tools, food, resources, armor, and consumables.
technical_description: Defined in items.xml with action classes, stats, and attachments.
player_impact: Items are what you loot, craft, equip, and use to survive.

layman_description: Temporary or permanent status effects - includes diseases, perks, food buffs, and injuries.
technical_description: Defined in buffs.xml with duration, stat modifiers, and triggers.
player_impact: Buffs can help (coffee speed boost) or hurt (infection damage over time).
